title: Parallels Desktop IDE Heap-based Buffer Overflow Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target guest system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the IDE virtual device. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of the length of user-supplied data prior to copying it to a fixed-length heap-based buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of the hypervisor.
addtionnal_details: Parallels has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://kb.parallels.com/en/125013

2021-02-26 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
